Detailed Description

Implementation of the standard ps command.

Lists all the processes running in the system myps [OPTION] Default(Lists the processes started by the current user) -a: Lists all the processes regardless of the terminal user

Author:
Bishal Santra

char** AllocateMem ( char **  files  ) 
int main ( int  argc,
char *  argv[] 
)

Main of myps program.

Reads through the directory /proc and from all the process directories it reads and parses the following files --/proc/[pid]/stat -> for pid, tty/pts dev, running time, etc. --/proc/[pid]/status -> for UID --/proc/[pid]/cmdline -> for exe path

Parameters:
arg[0] <optional> -a
Returns:
int(0)
